feedbackText: This class helped me understand React better. Highly recommended!
Node.js basics were very well explained. The best class I've taken!
UI/UX Design Fundamentals covered a lot of useful topics for aspiring designers!
Python for Data Science was an excellent course to start learning Python.
Machine Learning Basics gave me a strong foundation to explore further topics.
Full-Stack Web Development using MERN stack is a must for anyone serious about web development!
